Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.diagnostics

Class PageModelDiagnostics

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.diagnostics.PageModelDiagnostics
public final class PageModelDiagnostics extends Object
Diagnostic utilities for analyzing PageModel API responses and HST configuration issues. Provides detailed diagnostic information when pages or components are not found.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • diagnosePageNotFound

      public static DiagnosticResult diagnosePageNotFound(String expectedPage, String requestPath, PageModelResponse pageModel)
      Diagnoses why a page is not loading as expected. Checks if the actual page matches the expected page and provides recommendations.
      Parameters:
      expectedPage - the expected page name
      requestPath - the request path
      pageModel - the PageModel response
      Returns:
      diagnostic result with severity and recommendations

    • diagnoseComponentNotFound

      public static DiagnosticResult diagnoseComponentNotFound(String componentName, PageModelResponse pageModel)
      Diagnoses why a component is not found in the PageModel. Provides list of available components and recommendations.
      Parameters:
      componentName - the expected component name
      pageModel - the PageModel response
      Returns:
      diagnostic result with severity and recommendations

    • diagnoseComponentNotFound

      public static DiagnosticResult diagnoseComponentNotFound(String componentName, String requestUri, PageModelResponse pageModel)
      Diagnoses why a component is not found in the PageModel. When the page map is empty, uses the request URI to give targeted sitemap advice.
      Parameters:
      componentName - the expected component name
      requestUri - the full request URI (e.g. /site/fpp/resourceapi), used to extract sitemap path
      pageModel - the PageModel response
      Returns:
      diagnostic result with severity and recommendations

    • diagnoseEmptyResponse

      public static DiagnosticResult diagnoseEmptyResponse(String requestUri)
      Diagnoses an empty HTTP response from a Page Model API request. An empty body typically means HST encountered a ContainerException, most commonly caused by a component class that is not loadable in the test classpath.
      Parameters:
      requestUri - the full request URI (e.g. /site/fr/resourceapi)
      Returns:
      diagnostic result with severity and recommendations

    • diagnoseEmptyContainer

      public static DiagnosticResult diagnoseEmptyContainer(String containerName, PageModelResponse pageModel)
      Diagnoses why a container is empty (has no children). Checks if the container exists and analyzes its structure.
      Parameters:
      containerName - the container name to check
      pageModel - the PageModel response
      Returns:
      diagnostic result with severity and recommendations
